SELECT B.BNUM, B.Title, M.u_nickname, B.Content, B.CID, B.Attachment, B.Modified_Attachment, B.READACCOUNT, B.BDATE, B.Modified_BDATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.u_no = M.u_no) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.u_nickname LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Title LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Content LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CID LIKE '%'||#{categoryKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.BNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.u_no = M.u_no) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.u_nickname LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Title LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Content LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CID LIKE '%'||#{categoryKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.BNUM DESC

SELECT B.BNUM, B.Title, B.u_no, M.u_nickname, B.READACCOUNT, B.Attachment, B.Modified_Attachment, B.Content, B.CID, B.BDATE, B.Modified_BDATE, R.CNum AS R_CNum, R.BNUM AS R_BNUM, R.content AS R_content, R.u_nickname AS R_u_nickname, M2.u_id AS R_u_id, R.CDATE AS R_CDATE, R.Modified_CDATE AS R_Modified_CDATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.u_no = M.u_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON(B.BNUM = R.BNUM) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.u_no = M2.u_no) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BNUM=#{boNo}
